title: Back in Stock: Fear is the Mind Killer Stem Caps
content:
With Dune Part 2 hitting theaters this past weekend (please see it if you haven’t yet!), we’d thought it’d be a good time to re-up our Fear is the Mind Killer stem caps first debuted here on The Radavist in 2015!

“I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone, there will be nothing. Only I will remain.”

― Frank Herbert, Dune.

Swoop one up at The Radavist Web Shop!

The post Back in Stock: Fear is the Mind Killer Stem Caps appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
